contact.title: Let's get in touch!
contact.description: Looking for an experienced Test engineer for your project? Contact me, I'd be happy to discuss collaboration details.

hero_description: I'm looking for a place to grow my skills and experience, where I can contribute to the success of the team and organization.
about:
I am an experienced Principal Software Quality Engineer with a passion for ensuring the highest quality of software. I specialize in test automation, testing strategies, and QA team management.

Throughout my career, I have had the opportunity to work on diverse projects, from enterprise systems to modern cloud applications. I value teamwork, continuous process improvement, and knowledge sharing with others.

exp_1_tasks: Design, development, and maintenance of automated testing strategies for complex systems (JAVA, BDD, GIT, REST, gRPC)
Creation and enforcement of quality standards and testing procedures at product and organizational level
Analysis of test results, defect reporting, and recommending corrective actions (JENKINS, Internal Frameworks)
Root cause analysis and resolution of quality issues in collaboration with development teams (JIRA, GitHub)
Verification of architecture, system integration, and data processing correctness (GCP, GKE)
Coordination of the testing team and support for recruitment processes
Technical mentoring and onboarding of new team members
R&D work in the area of test tool and application development (AI Agents, Testing Frameworks)
exp_2_tasks: Development of automated tests (JAVA, BDD, GIT, gRPC)
Root cause analysis with developers (JENKINS, GCP, Helm)
Supervision and onboarding of new employees
R&D work in the area of test and application development
exp_3_tasks: Development of automated tests (JAVA, BDD, GIT)
Root cause analysis with developers (JENKINS, GCP)
exp_4_tasks: Development of automated tests (Python, BDD, Behave, GIT)
Root cause analysis with developers (JENKINS, ALLURE)
exp_5_tasks: Development and maintenance of test automation tools (Python, C#)
Development of database components (MS SQL, ORM)
Development of API components supporting large data sets (.NET Core, Entity Framework)
Data management in data warehouses (iRODS, AWS)
Active participation in project development (Gitlab, Microsoft DevOps)
Management, maintenance, and deployment of test automation on HPCC under Unix (Bash, Slurm)
Participation in technical reviews of tools and programs from internal and external suppliers
exp_6_tasks: Development and administration of tools supporting team work and test automation (Python, Matlab)
Support and supervision of archiving and version control processes (GIT, Plastic SCM)
Creation of technical documentation, instructions, lessons learned (Confluence)
Execution of tests, report creation, and bug reporting (JIRA)
Analysis and co-creation of project and testing requirements
Active participation and leadership in project meetings and review processes
Supervision and onboarding of new employees
exp_7_tasks: Preparation of documentation and test scenarios based on requirements (Microsoft Office)
Execution of tests, report creation, and bug reporting (JIRA)
Cooperation with other teams (locally and remotely)
experience_data.exp_8_title: Visual Data Indexing and Classification Specialist
exp_8_tasks: Classification and indexing of visual information
Participation in the creation and adaptation of test automation scripts (MATLAB)

education_data.edu_2_spec: Specialization: Automation in Electrical Systems. Thesis: Three-phase voltage inverter with switching assistance.
education_data.edu_3_school: Technical School No. 14 at the Communication Schools Complex

cert_2.name: Certificate confirming the acquisition of first-degree qualifications in Electrical Engineering, specializing in Automation in Electrical Systems, with a good result.

cert_3.name: Certificate confirming professional qualifications as an Electronics Technician.

consent: I hereby give consent for my personal data to be processed for the purposes of recruitment in accordance with Article 6(1)(a) of Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, and repealing Directive 95/46/EC (General Data Protection Regulation).
